name: 20 Speed tips
description:
I collected my favorite tips and tricks I find myself using just about every day while designing in Figma. Sometimes I find myself with only a few minutes between meetings to make a quick sketch or file a bug report with an annotated images. These shortcuts are particularly helpful in those moments to work quickly.


This was created for a "Figma Office Hours Livestream" where 10 fellow Figma employees shared 5 min tips on how they use Figma.
